choices.C: Assign a dial plan to the users.
choices.D: Assign an IP phone policy to the users.

questions.question_text:
You have a Microsoft Teams Phone deployment. Direct Routing is enabled for all users. The users can place and receive PSTN calls.
You need to create a new user policy to provide four-digit extension dialing for users to call analog endpoints that connect to the Session Border Controller (SBC).
Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CEF
C+E+F look good. It says new policy so you first have to create a new tenant dial plan. In that dial plan you are defining the voice normalization rule for the dialing and finally you have to assign the dial plan (policy) to the user.

Selected Answer: CEF
C E F is correct.

Selected Answer: CEF
C E F is correct.
C+E+F is correct

choices.B: Order a new number from Microsoft.
choices.A: Submit a request to convert the number from a user number to a service number.

questions.question_text:
You port phone numbers from a legacy carrier to Microsoft Teams Phone to use with Microsoft Teams Calling Plans.
You attempt to assign a number to a resource account that will be used by an auto attendant, but the number does NOT appear on the list of available numbers.
You need to ensure that you can assign the number to the resource account.
What should you do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
should be the answer A

Selected Answer: A
In TAC you need to specify the goal for each number, be it for an individual or for a service.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

Selected Answer: A
Definitely A, when you search C online the function is wrong and getting deprecated.
Set-CsOnlineApplicationInstance - 
Note: The use of this cmdlet for assigning phone numbers has been deprecated. Use the new Set-CsPhoneNumberAssignment and Remove-CsPhoneNumberAssignment cmdlets instead.

Selected Answer: A
The answer should be A. since in the calling plan if you want to assign number to resourse account it must be a service number.

Selected Answer: A
should be the answer A

Should ba A. Cause number is already ported but the number he is looking for to assign is not showing, it is because that number was ported as user number. You can make a request to MSFT to change the number type.

comments.content: In addition to that, the command is even outdated that makes it even worse to guess. The current command to assign numbers is "Set-CsPhoneNumberAssignment".

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The question is about calling plans and it states the number is not available to be selected this will be because the number will be a subscriber number not a service number. Subscribers are for users Service for everything else.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Your company has offices throughout the United States.
The company is opening a new office in Scranton. The office will occupy two floors in the same building.
You need to ensure that if an emergency call is placed, the local emergency dispatchers know from which floor the call came.
How should you complete the PowerShell script? To answer, drag the appropriate values to the correct targets. Each value may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content: Should be New-CsOnlineLisLocation for both

comments.content: You are correct, because both of them considered "new place"
Correct, for the last command you need to create a new location (2nd floor) for the existing civic address

discussion.content:
I agree with Larry35's answer which is "New-CsOnlineLisLocation for both".

The 1st 3 lines create a new LIS location of the "Scranton Office, 1st Floor" with '-Description "Scranton"'.
In the 4th line, get all the information of LIS address of '-Description "Scranton"' and put it into the parameter $Scranton.
In the last line, create a new LIS Location by using $Scranton and also enter the new information of '-Location "Scranton Office, 2nd Floor"
Looks like the given answers are correct https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/skype/set-csonlinelislocation?view=skype-ps

comments.content: Use the `Set-CsOnlineLisLocation` cmdlet to modify an existing emergency dispatch location. There can be multiple locations in a civic address. Typically the civic address designates the building, and locations are specific parts of that building such as a floor, office, or wing.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CDE
Correct answer given.

correct answer CDE

Selected Answer: CDE
Voice routing policies are contained inside PSTN usages which normally requires a SBC HA pair

You have a Microsoft Teams deployment and an existing telephony solution that provides PSTN capability to on-premises third-party PBX systems in two separate locations.
You need to implement a redundant PSTN solution for Microsoft Teams Phone. The solution must use the existing telephony carrier services. The solution must ensure that outbound calls can be made if a component fails.
Which three components should you implement? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

questions.question_text:
The sales department at your company needs to route a call to multiple users and have calls route differently after business hours.
Which two features should you implement? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
